title: Login not working
description: User cannot log in with correct credentials. After submitting the username and password, the page refreshes without error, but the user is redirected back to the login screen.

title: Dark mode toggle not persisting
description: When users switch to dark mode, the setting resets to light mode after page reload.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Users are experiencing timeout errors when processing credit card payments. It happens intermittently and seems to affect users from the EU region.

title: Search results not updating
description: When users search for a keyword, the results page doesn't update unless they refresh manually.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Support agents are receiving ticket notification emails 30â€“40 minutes late.

title: Attachment upload failed
description: Users cannot upload files larger than 5 MB even though the limit is set to 10 MB.

title: Dashboard not loading for new users
description: Newly registered users see a blank screen on the dashboard page.

title: Password reset link expired
description: The password reset link sent via email expires within 5 minutes, even though it should be 30.

title: Mobile view misaligned
description: The layout on mobile devices is distorted on the profile settings page.

title: Analytics page showing stale data
description: The analytics page shows data from the previous day and doesn't refresh even after multiple reloads.
